languages.text: Автопистолеты и лазружья, цепные мечи и пулеметы — орудия гнева Императора. Блаженны оружейники, ибо без них нет Империума.

traits.locale_text: Автопистолеты и лазганы, цепные мечи и стабберы — орудия гнева Императора. Блаженны оружейники, ибо без них нет Империума.

languages.text: Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.
languages.original_text: Автопистолеты и лазружья, цепные мечи и пулеметы — орудия гнева Императора. Блаженны оружейники, ибо без них нет Империума.

traits.locale_text: Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords and stabbers are all tools of The Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.
Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords and stabbers are all tools of The Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.
Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stabbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.
Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.
Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.
Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.

languages.text: 自动手枪、激光枪、链锯剑与伐木枪都可以用来倾泻帝皇的怒火。愿神皇保佑那些武器制造大师，因为如果没有他们，就没有帝国本身。
languages.original_text: Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.

traits.locale_text: 自动手枪、激光枪、链锯剑与伐木枪都可以用来倾泻帝皇的怒火。愿神皇保佑那些武器制造大师，因为如果没有他们，就没有帝国本身。

languages.text: Las pistolas automáticas, los rifles láser, las espadas sierra y las ametralladoras son instrumentos de la furia del Emperador. Benditos sean los armeros, pues sin ellos no existiría el Imperium.
languages.original_text: Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Las pistolas automáticas, los rifles láser, las espadas sierra y las ametralladoras son instrumentos de la furia del Emperador. Benditos sean los armeros, pues sin ellos no existiría el Imperium.

languages.text: オートピストル、ラスガン、チェーンソード、スタバーはすべて皇帝陛下の激憤の道具である。武器職人に幸あれ。彼らなくして帝国はありえない。
languages.original_text: Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.

traits.locale_text: オートピストル、ラスガン、チェーンソード、スタバーはすべて皇帝陛下の激憤の道具である。武器職人に幸あれ。彼らなくして帝国はありえない。

languages.text: Maschinenpistolen, Lasergewehre, Kettenschwerter und Maschinengewehre sind alles Instrumente des Zorns des Imperators. Gesegnet sind die Waffenschmiede, denn ohne sie gibt es kein Imperium.
languages.original_text: Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Maschinenpistolen, Lasergewehre, Kettenschwerter und Maschinengewehre sind alles Instrumente des Zorns des Imperators. Gesegnet sind die Waffenschmiede, denn ohne sie gibt es kein Imperium.

languages.text: Pistolets automatiques, fusils laser, épées tronçonneuses et fusils de combat sont tous des instruments au service de la colère de l'Empereur. Bénis soient les forgerons d'armes, car sans eux, il n'y aurait pas d'Imperium.
languages.original_text: Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.

traits.locale_text: Pistolets automatiques, fusils laser, épées tronçonneuses et fusils de combat sont tous des instruments au service de la colère de l'Empereur. Bénis soient les forgerons d'armes, car sans eux, il n'y aurait pas d'Imperium.

languages.text: Ototabancalar, silazerler, motorlu kılıç ve bodurcaların hepsi İmparator'un gazabının araçlarıdır. Silahçılara şükürler olsun zira onlarsız İmparatorluk var olamazdı.
languages.original_text: Autopistols, lasguns, chainswords, and stubbers are all instruments of the Emperor's fury. Blessed are the weaponsmiths, for without them there is no Imperium.
